duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership and direction to teams on the production line.
Develop, maintain, and improve assembly processes.
Collaborate with Quality Engineers on process improvement and monitoring tools.
Drive production schedules and process-related problems to closure.
Support new product introduction and development.
Assist in the compliance of safety regulations and business controls.
Provide production-ready documentation with equipment setup and programs.
Monitor equipment performance and make minor adjustments.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree, vocational or technical training, or equivalent.
